factions.Name: Cosmicons
factions.Description: Descendants of spiral beings, representing order and authority.

factions.Name: Spirats
factions.Description: Anarchic space pirates opposing law and order.

factions.Name: Webes
factions.Description: A faction of AI beings seeking to forge their own destiny.

factions.Name: Celestials
factions.Description: Ancient entities focused on maintaining cosmic balance.

factions.Name: Archs
factions.Description: A relentless swarm-like civilization, evolving and adapting through a collective will and singular purpose.

factions.Name: Spades
factions.Description: Malevolent space demons thriving in chaos and darkness.

factions.Name: Neutral
factions.Description: Events and actions not specific to any one faction.
